Service Details: - Prepares annual Income Tax returns for low-income adults- Returns are completed by trained volunteers
Dates: March and April by appointment only
Eligibility: - Adults who are low income, unemployed, on EI, disability, or receiving Social Assistance- This service is also available to seniors
